cost_center.description: Code representing the cost center associated with the transaction.

requester.description: Name of the person who requested the transaction.

approval_status.description: Current approval status of the transaction.

approved_by.description: Name of the person who approved the transaction, if applicable.

vendor.description: Vendor from whom the item/service was purchased.

item.description: Description of the item or service purchased.

category.description: Category of the item or service.

cost_usd.description: Cost of the transaction in USD.

purchase_date.description: Date when the purchase was made.

delivery_date.description: Expected or actual delivery date of the item/service.

tags.description: Tags associated with the transaction for categorization or notes.

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the transaction.
